column4: I'm using mplayer-nogui version: 2:1.0~rc2-0ubuntu13+medibuntu1 on Ubuntu 8.04 64bit and the last two movies I've watched (.mkv x264 720p) have started lagging after a while and when looking at the process in System Monitor I see that it's using a lot of memory. Last time it happened it was using 800 megabytes, before that 1.2 gigabytes. I had to end the process and start the movie again to be able to continue watching. What could the pro
use the gl mode, and read the man page... experiment with the options
gl didn't work very well. mplayer didn't get any borders, the video was just floating on it's own and in full screen the background would flash in some places
